alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 11:41PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect southwestern Cuyahoga and northeastern Lorain Counties Until 1245 AM EST.... At 1140 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Lakewood to Westlake to near North Ridgeville. This intense lake effect snow band was nearly stationary. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Elyria, Parma, Lakewood, Strongsville, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Grafton, North Olmsted, Avon, Parma Heights, Rocky River, Brook Park, Berea, Fairview Park, Middleburg Heights, Bay Village, Brooklyn and Olmsted Falls. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 302, 303, 304, 309, 310, 311, and 321.
